column4: hi has anyone installed freebsd on ubuntu? does it probably make any problem in multi bood logo?
kakipukul i have winxp and ubuntu now i want to install freebsd on my system as well , but i am afraid of loosing these two in my multi boot session
one thing I can tell is to use different swap partitions for BSD and Linux.  I talked to someone today who had big problems trying to use the same partition.
